reviews.review_msg: Participation Matters. Reads off slides and gives solution to homework is all she does. Solution to homework are taken from students in class - so sometimes they are wrong. Hard marker. Would not recommend at all.

She does NOT know what she is doing during classes. Throwing tax material to you with 0 explanation and lecture full of a LOT inconsistency, Did not know how did she get her Phd and will NOT recommend you to take her class, if you have to, i hope you could wait for other professors. Please listen to me! You will be receiving a B- for sure. Trust me

Doesn't teach at SFU anymore, she's at Brock University now teaching taxation 2. She is the absolute worst professor I have had in my entire life. Extremley hard to understand, throws up a slide every class and literally reads directly from the slides with absolutely no teaching involved. The worst professor at Brock BY far.
